---
package: "@rhythm-ui/icon"
title: "rui-icon"
---

# Icon

Icon provides a convenient way to style your icon set. Icon can take an svg, png or data object as image source.

## Default

```html preview
<rui-icon src="/icons/chat.svg"></rui-icon>
<rui-icon src="/icons/world.png"></rui-icon>
<rui-icon src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"></rui-icon>
```


## A11Y support

In cases where the icon isn't purely decorative provide an alt text for A11Y support.

```html preview
<rui-icon src="/icons/chat.svg" alt="Chat bubble"></rui-icon>
<rui-icon src="/icons/world.png" alt="World"></rui-icon>
<rui-icon src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," alt="Person"></rui-icon>
```
